reauth_confirm.description: Your current API key: {api_key} is no longer valid. Please enter a new valid API key.

deprecated_image_filename_parameter.description: The 'image_filename' parameter in Google Generative AI actions is deprecated. Please edit scripts and automations to use 'filenames' instead.
deprecated_image_filename_parameter.title: Deprecated 'image_filename' parameter

filenames.description: Attachments to add to the prompt (images, PDFs, etc)
filenames.name: Attachment filenames
